item.title: About the project
item.description: Introduction Understanding Religion is a website that aims to provide easy access to information about the study of religion, published by the Online Centre for Religious Studies. Always free, written clearly for a wide audience, grounded in academic study and supported by references for those who want to dive deeper. It draws inspiration from a wide variety of online resources - notably Wikipedia, but also Harvard University’s Pluralism Project and the essays and resources published by REOnline.
